attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Channel 7 is the last remaining not-for-profit community channel in England. 

It broadcasts much needed local information and entertainment shows about the local areas of North Lincolnshire. 

Following over 10 years of broadcasting on Virgin Media, Channel 7 has been served notice that Virgin intend to stop carrying the local channel from October 2009 and have refused to negotiate or investate alternative options. 

We would therefore urge the Prime Minister to step in to ensure valuable local broadcasters like this are not lost and that space is made available to allow them to continue to serve the community.
